229800.「ゴロンちゃんに あたえる\n チカラのかけらの 組み合わせを\n 選んでくださ:
Please choose a combination of the power
fragments you wish to give to Goron-chan.<break>

229802.「……あら？ その組み合わせだと\n <%sM_MONSTER>に かえすことは:
... Oh? You can't replace <%sM_MONSTER> with
that combination...<bw_break>

229804.「<%sM_MONSTER>の姿に かえすのは \n やめるんですね。\n<bw: I'm not going to turn into a <%sM_MONSTER>...<bw_break>

229806.「……あら？ その組み合わせだと\n <%sM_MONSTER>に かえすことは:
... Oh? You can't replace <%sM_MONSTER> with
that combination... <%nM_RIGHT_ANSWERS> seems
to work!<break>

229810.「……あら？ もう\n その姿にかえすことは できませんよ。\n<bw_brea: ... What? I can't turn you back into that.<bw_break>

229812.「……あら？ その組み合わせだと\n チカラのかけらが 足りないみたいです。\n:
... What? That combination looks like it's
missing a piece of power...<bw_break>

229814.「……あら？\n どうぐかばんが いっぱいみたいです。\n<br>\n「チカラの:
... What? I saw your bag full of stuff... I'd like to thank you for delivering the power pieces, so could you please come back after
you've sorted them out? I'm begging you!

229816.「お待ちしてました！ \n じつは また あなたに\n お願いしたいことがあるん:
We've been expecting you! Actually, there's
something I need you to do for me again!<bw_break>

229818.「ゴロンちゃんが どんな姿になるかは \n チカラのかけらの 組み合わせによって:
The shape of the Goron-chan depends on the
combination of the pieces of power...<bw_break>

229820.「わたしたち 妖精の国に \n そろそろ 帰らないといけないんです。\n また:
We have to go back to Fairyland soon... I'll
see you again!<end>

229822.「ゴロンちゃんを どんな姿に\n かえしてあげますか？\n<break>: What would you like Goron-chan to look like?<break>

230279.「……あら？\n それは どんな姿にかえるか\n まだ わからないんです。\n<:
... Huh? We don't know what it's going to
look like yet...<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>Day (<tw%wM_TIME>）<th%nM_TIME>I'll know when it's time, so please look
forward to it!<bw_break>

234800.「<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>日（<tw%wM_TIME>:
<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>Day (<tw%wM_TIME>）<th%nM_TIME>When the time comes, you'll be able to see
